subject: Out of Office 5/9-Returning 5/12 RE: Eugene PD | Flyer Communication
body:
You don't often get email from kristen.macleod@flocksafety.com. Learn why this is important <https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification>  
	

[EXTERNAL ?]

Hello, 
Thank you for your message. I am out of the office 5/9 and will return Monday, 5/12. I will respond as soon as possible upon my return; if you need immediate assistance, please get in touch with Trevor Chandler, Director of Public Affairs (trevor.chandler@flocksafety.com hector.soliman@flocksafety.com ). 

Thank you, and I look forward to connecting with you when I get back.

Sincerely,
Kristen




-- 

	
Kristen MacLeod
She/Her
Public Affairs Manager



 https://www.instagram.com/flocksafety/ 

	
 https://www.flocksafety.com/articles/1000-missing-persons-reunited?utm_campaign=EmailSignature&utm_source=ExternalCommunications&utm_medium=Wisestamp 

	
 

	
 	 
 <https://tracy.srv.wisestamp.com/px/wsid/oqJKGQNorVDa.png>
